About me

Senior International Trade Specialist with seven years of experience in customs clearance and extensive knowledge of import compliance and control processes. Problem solver with a passion for entrepreneurship, improving processes and technology with proven research, writing, and communication skills. I am amazed by all the possibilities created by education and technology to improve the lives of people across the world and excited to thrive on a technology company.
